flawed_nl_solution:
Each employee needs $35000-$20000=$<<35000-20000=15000>>15000 more per year.
In total, Emily needs to pay $15000*10=$<<15000*10=105000>>105000 extra.
Emily will need to have a new salary of $1000000-$105000=$<<1000000-105000=895000>>895000 per year.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150000, not 105000. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
